website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-calibrate, brightly backlit learning remote for multiple devices, some users may be annoyed by the need to frequently reset the unit or recalibrate the air mouse.
pros: Air mouse centers on TV right away and is easy to turn off and on
Bluetooth link between USB dongle and remote is strong
Connects to most devices without extra programming or updates needed
cons: Some owners had great difficulty programming the remote
On-screen pointer is too jittery for fine control, and mouse needs frequent recalibrating
Keypad controls aren’t laid out intuitively

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I liked the virtual mouse feature however, it would periodically disconnect from my Windows HTPC requiring remove/reinsert the wireless adapter. The light didn't actually show the 'special' keys on the keyboard including numbers. Just maddening to use.
customer_reviews.author: Staylorme

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for Nvidea shield remote
customer_reviews.text: Lost my Shield remote (in a recliner) and looked for a quality replacement, and found this one recommended by several people, so... I bought it. It does a LOT more than the original remote, which fell out of the recliner the day this one arrived, along with giving me air mouse, volume control, mute, and FULL keypad (no more using the stupid onscreen keyboard for us!) and many more abilities that we are still discovering. Only flaw I found is with Funimation, no button on here will make it click to start, every other channel works like a charm, so it much just be Funimation (luckily I found the other remote, I guess). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this remote. I bought 4 n I wish I cld get my money bck. I haven't use one of them for about a month n for some unknown reason, the keyboard on the remote stopped working. There's no physical damage on it to try to assume that's where the malfunction comes from. I also got this remote because it was Amazon recommended, I know now better. Now, I'm looking to buy 4 new mini keyboards from a different manufacturer. This remote feels, and looks poorly made n that's what they r. Save ur money, or if ur interest, I'll sell them to u for 5 a pcs. Lol
customer_reviews.author: JIN

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is useless in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: Why, why, why would you make the alt key lettering blue? It makes the keyboard virtually useless in the dark. You only see the standard keyboard lettering with the backlight and not the alt lettering. Why????? Everything else works great as long as you don't use the keyboard in the dark. What's the point???
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: I watch content pretty exclusively via my laptop hdmi and the ability to ...
customer_reviews.text: I only got this and set it up yesterday so time will tell whether it stands the durability test. But I've got to say it passes the functionality rest with flying colors! This is everything I've ever wanted in a remote. I watch content pretty exclusively via my laptop hdmi and the ability to control both the major functions of the TV via the easily programmable it buttons, coupled with control of the mouse cursor and keyboard functionality for searches is amazing. This thing works exactly as it should and has shattered my expectations for the price. Six stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dog of Bery

customer_reviews.title: Some of this remote works some of the time - take this as a review of all MX3 Pro's
customer_reviews.text: Most of it works, most of the time, but some buttons do absolutely nothing in certain apps such as Hulu, VRV and Prime Video. By some buttons I mean the 'ok' button and any of the alphabet keys. In those apps I can use back or home or any directions, but other input simply does not work - making it totally useless. Cant even click with the mouse... My universal remote works just fine in all these apps, although it is strictly IR and not BT like these mx3's. I just wanted a mouse/keyboard built in to my remote, but it looks like this is not the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Nubixcube

customer_reviews.title: Great... As long as you have batteries
customer_reviews.text: The remote itself is pretty great. It is responsive, does what it says. It does go into sleep mode so it requires a double click when waking up which isn't a problem at all. The only issue is the battery life. Thank goodness we have rechargeable batteries because in the few months we have owned it we would have most certainly paid more than the remote itself just got batteries. We have turned off the LED to conserve battery but it doesn't work. We change them at least once or twice a week and we only watch 2ish hours of TV per day with minimal use of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Some annoyances
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Occasionally the remote reverts to mouse mode, which is really horrible. Also just as often is the LEDs get stuck and do not turn off. Less often the remote stops working completely and requires a dongle pull. The battery life is not great but not bad. On the plus side the back buttons and alternate menu button are nicely placed and very useful. The keyboard on the back is extremely useful. While typing a lot you are bound to get a few characters that don't register. It almost seems like intentionally after a cycle of so many characters. When this happens on alt and/or caps get ready for frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Times out
customer_reviews.text: Major dead spots. Times out after two minutes of inactivity meaning when I go to press the button again I often have to press it twice. I would much rather swap batteries everyday then deal with that. I've had three or four of these remotes before, that didn't time out, and the battery life wasn't much shorter. This feature is not helping, it's crap, your remote is now crap, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great air mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air mouse. I have been using the little keyboards with the finger mouse. Hated them. Happened upon a video for the air mouse on youtube and I bought this one. Takes a bit of getting used too but I love it in comparison to the keyboards. So far more of it's buttons work with my android box too. And the flip over function for the keyboard is great. I may get something fancier at a later date but this is perfect for me right now.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Farrimond

customer_reviews.title: Really bad, hard, unreliable remote
customer_reviews.text: Even thought it has nice bells and whistles (backlit, movement tracking as mouse, keyboard) it lacks of reliability and quality. The keys are often not registered, the mouse tracking is spotty and slow, and the keyboard is an atrocity (hard, loud and unreliable like the rest of the remote). I'm happy to stick with my keyboard/mouse/tv remote, than to use this one ever again. Obviously its getting returned, and I do not recommend to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great remote for the price.  Excellent performance so far after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance from this air-mouse remote thus far. Only reason I'm not going to 5 star is that every now and then, when I boot up the TV box, the remote comes out stuck on only half the screen. So, not sure if it's the box's fault, or the remote's fault. I have to re-boot the box, and then it works fine. This only happens once is a while, so not a big deal. For the most part, it work great. For the price, you can't beat it. The back keyboard is totally useless. Can't really read the letters on the keys. But don't really need that part, as most apps give a soft keyboard on the screen anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Lion

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I currently use this remote with Kodi on my Raspberry Pi and it works perfectly. I also programmed the power button to turn my TV on and OFF, as well as program the bottom four buttons for input, muting, volume up, and volume down. Now I no longer need to use my TV remote. I felt like the instructions were a little unclear on getting the remote to learn. The instructions said to hold down the TV remote button until the Air Mouse started blinking, but in reality, all I needed to do was press the TV remote button and the Air Mouse went to solid, then I could select the button I wanted to program.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander D.

customer_reviews.title: Great remote for Nvidia Shield TV!
customer_reviews.text: The stock remote that comes with the Nvidia Shield was driving me crazy. It never connects with the device, and takes minutes to reconnect often, if ever. I researched a bunch of remotes and decided on this one. I am super happy with it. It connects instantly, has a keyboard and screen mouse, and is so much faster when controlling the Shield. I bought 2 more straight away for the other Shields in my home. Totally a worth while purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nodonn

customer_reviews.title: Just Works!
customer_reviews.text: I used this airmouse for my media streaming box. Plugged in the receiver, pushed the mouse button on the Favormates remote, and bingo, mouse pointer on the screen. For those who may have had problems with keeping the gestures centered for the mouse, just move the mouse any direction to the edge, push that direction as needed and your mouse will be recentered when you move it back to the middle of the screen. Build feels solid, couldn't rate 5 stars until I see what the battery life is.
customer_reviews.author: ob1

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th air mouse. This one is the best of the 4. You will want to program the power key to the TV power or something similar otherwise it will force a computer shutdown. I would also recommend programming the red button to the same and try to make a habit of using that one in case the power button gets reset somehow. It happened on another product for me. Toggle the mouse/cursor button to disable it if you are using it on a media player. Working great with Kodi on Win 10 and Ubunto based systems.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this control to use it with my androide box, I must say that the reception of the signal between the remote and the box is very good, even better than the remote that came with de equipment!!! Which was a great and pleasant surprise. Another advantage is the keyboard that allows you to use them typing the letter inmmediatly and avoid the laborious procedure of placing one by one the letters on the screen, which by the way was much more complicated. Additional has a pointer that allows you to use it. Certainly this is a mouse and a keyboard and a remote in one device.
customer_reviews.author: Betzy

customer_reviews.title: Functions as described, no major issues
customer_reviews.text: No real issues with functionality, other than the fact that the motion is a little jerky when using it as an air mouse. That may be able to be solved by going to your settings in Windows and making some adjustments. But I use more than one Mouse and don't really like switching settings around just to use this remote once in awhile when I'm using the PC to watch movies. Don't know how it functions on an Android box or anything like that because I don't own one. But for the price I'm satisfied... Just what I needed to do look cool. Buttons are responsive. Decent remote for the price
customer_reviews.author: gtrman1263

customer_reviews.title: Better than I would have thought
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes for this remote to control my Android tv box. I was surprised how good it works. My only issues is that I wished it would allow me to use more of the TV remote functions or allowed more functions to be programmed into it. The keyboard really helps with NetFlix and Amazon Movies searches. Air mouse took a little getting use to but it worked great once you do get it down.
customer_reviews.author: Duc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mouse for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mouse for the money. Able to program it to operate my HDMI switch and the volume keys on my receiver. Keyboard works well as do the arrow keys but the latter could have been a little larger. The air mouse constantly needs adjustment to get the cursor pointing in the same direction as the remote. You can use it for awhile but if you go back to it later you have to realign it. The quickest way to do this is to move the cursor to the edge of the screen until it aligns with the position of the remote. If this problem could be solved it would easily be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hall

customer_reviews.title: Un-lit keys are too faint
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of back lit air mouse remote. My first purchase was different brand. Both remotes seem to function as intended but the back light only stays on for a few seconds and the unlit keys are too dim for me to see, even in a well lit room. I bought the second remote because the picture seemed to have bolder unlit keys. Alas, this is not so and the keyboard is virtually useless for an old H&P typist like me. I can recall the main function positions so I can still use the mouse and main functions. Thankfully they are cheap and I may yet buy a non-back lit version
customer_reviews.author: Frank Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: When the airmouse was working it worked well. The problem is that it would disconnect and in order to reconnect I had to restart my Android TV box that is running the 8.1 system. I then tried using on my HP laptop. The same thing happened, it worked then it disconnected and that was the end for me. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: This Air Mouse works great on my streaming devices except for my Fire TV box. Not a big deal though. Actually bought this for a new box (has not arrived yet). Took a Raspberry Pi out of storage and to my surprise the mouse worked flawlessly! I had issues with this box not staying on page, thought it was the box, it was the cheap remote causing the problem. Couldn't be happier to be able to use the Pi again! I will be purchasing 2 more MX3 Pro's soon. Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: PRKilduff

customer_reviews.title: THE upgrade your TV box needs.
customer_reviews.text: I have an Android TV box. After 5 minutes with this remote I packed up the two remotes that came with the box. It works consistently, my old remote had to be pointed directly at the box. IR learning works perfectly (I programmed it to control my stereo receiver volume). The keyboard is genius, when I'm not using it I forget it's there. The Android connectivity is flawless (including KODI).
customer_reviews.author: Grimlock Review

customer_reviews.title: Great remote for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for your smart tv, or media streaming boxes. I love the backlight feature for dark room tv watching and the keyboard on the back is very useful for entering in information instead of pointing to each letter one at a time on your screen. The actual mouse pointer feature is a little tricky. I have to move my arm from one side of the room to the other to move the pointer across the screen. You can adjust the mouse feature but I'm still trying to get that worked out. I'd like it if it could program more than just the 4 colored buttons. Still a great remote for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kleineken

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Great remote. I have tried the Harmony remotes with too man features and the keyboard remotes. They all seem to lack a feature or two. I am able o control my sound bar and TV power through the IR functions. I saw no need in upgrading everything to get a Harmony remote to work with my nvidea shield being my primary box. Every botton does something which is great! Keyboard on back is hard to see in the dark but I manage by memory so not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P.

customer_reviews.title: MXIII-Backlit (get a non-Backlit instead)...
customer_reviews.text: Backlighting is useless. Mostly does not light up and when it does, it only stays on for about 2sec. Also, there is terrible lag from the keyboard. It pretty much ignores 50% or more of your key-presses. If you are lucky those lost key-presses will appear 10sec later, and you will have a bunch of characters to delete. I have another Keyboard, that works much better. Nevertheless, this MXIII, is great for the Home keys, etc. as well as the Colored Soft Keys. I will be tossing this and replacing with a non-backlight. Additionally, there is no Mic on this, so I will try to find one w/ a Mic.
customer_reviews.author: whatscrappening

customer_reviews.title: Great with Android TV box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this primarily for its back lit key feature to replace the unit that came with my tv box which does not have that feature. Without the back lighting capability and in a dark room (like a bedroom), it is nearly impossible to see the keys for proper selection. This worked flawlessly and they can be turned on and off at will for extended battery life. It was identical in layout as my original air mouse so everything worked exactly the same but now I have the back lit keys which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DougN

customer_reviews.title: Mouse is needed for adding some apks to your android tv box
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time I use the remote that came with my android boxes. However this air mouse is essential when it comes to shopping the Google Play Store or browsing the internet for apks And, a mouse function is necessary for using certain apps that were originally designed for phones. For instance, many ad blockers, vpns, speed testers, etc. Some people prefer to scroll with a touch pad remote. Personally, I like an air mouse. If you can point your finger at a tv screen, you can use this device.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and excellent accessory for Android boxes.
customer_reviews.text: I have several android boxes and I tried them on all of them. Worked great on all the boxes. The back lights work very well when we have our lights dimmed. The keypad is excellent but you have to have the remote pointing at it in a certain way or it may not input the typed key (the only reason I did not give it five stars) The pointer button is well placed which makes it easy to use. I saw a few vendors selling a similar version with their stamp on it for two to three times the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Soto

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best remotes!
customer_reviews.text: When first trying to use the remote was not really impressed then as I became more familiar with it now I am impressed. The only negative which is not enough to even remove 1 tip of a star is the instruction manual typical bad English and smaller than small print. The first one was a little difficult to program the power button the second one no problem at all. I have now spent about 2.5 hours playing with these remotes and I will have to say for my MeCool BB2 Pro Android TV Boxes they are the absolute best. A lot of thought was put into this design I now see why Amazon says it is an Amazon Choice.
customer_reviews.author: L Penny

customer_reviews.title: It's a Bitch to Work the Pointer But...
customer_reviews.text: HI, I've owned this approx 3 mos. It's NEEDED to make my streamer-box facilitate easier. Well, I find myself having to stretch my right hand from left to right as far as i can reach in order to get the darn 'arrow' on the spot i want it. Too many times I whack my dog or my wife or else hit the wrong spot & open up the wrong page. The price is right. I barley use the keyboard 'cause the light stays on for a nanosecond @ nite. Other than all of this--it works & the price was right as opposed to paying double for other models. thanks 4 reading
customer_reviews.author: DonTaylorJR

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WITH FIRE STICK
customer_reviews.text: First off it's Amazons fault that the warning will not work with fire stick is not displayed, that's on Amazon for not doing proper screening what's new right, you don't know this until you open the box and it is the first thing you read but it will work, all that's needed is a OTG CABLE but won't work if you hard wire fire stick to your router, other than that its a great remote and will do most things you want. So if your doing a fire stick also order a OTG cable.
customer_reviews.author: TALLONE

customer_reviews.title: Innovative device, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a remote to use with my Windows 10 PC connected to the tv for watching The Simpsons on the FXNOW app as I didn't want to have to keep my mouse and full-size keyboard within reach. This remote works great, and the air mouse not only works well but is a really cool way to control the computer. Setup was very easy, but I do wish there was an app to program all of the keys on the remote to mimic keyboard buttons. Overall a very cool item and exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Joe, Access3Dservices

customer_reviews.title: A really cool idea but the mini keyboard mouse combo or a ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but the pointer is rather tricky to control. If the goal of technology is to make tasks more simple, I don't think this one meets the standard. It definitely complicates things for me. A really cool idea but the mini keyboard mouse combo or a simple wireless mouse performs the same trick and a lot easier. The need to press the function key to activate numbers on the keyboard just typifies the lack of functionality this thing has. It's cool, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Chambliss

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Different from Amazon display.
customer_reviews.text: The remote looks good on Amazon, but what I received was different. The colors were darker. No markings on buttons visible, e.i, ok buttin, etc. At very close view, the marking could barely be seen. The whole quality of the remote was totally different from disolayed image on Amazon by seller. 1st foto is what is displayed on Amazon by seller. The other fotos is what they sent me.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Best remote for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well this remote works. I replaced a Gyration because it failed and I didn't want to spend that much money again. The Gyration works a little better as an air mouse but it doesn't have a keyboard like this does. This remote is also much more versatile. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for the tech-illiterate *(me)*
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that I was able to pick it up and use it without a tutorial - seriously, I am very inept with electronics! But it is very easy to use, the mouse is easy to control (that's a HUGE plus!), and I love how there are various colors for different functions, which makes it much easier to figure out what on earth you're doing. I haven't figured out yet how to sync it with all my other stuff, but I'm pretty sure it's doable, so I'll have to look into it. Other than that, it's a great buy and I'm thrilled with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Tennison

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I stream shows and movies from my PC to my TV via an HDMI cable and was previously having to get up off the couch to change shows, enable subtitles, etc. Now, I can be lazy and stay on the couch! Unfortunately my VIZIO TV remote isn't compatible with the IR learning so I can't program the power and color buttons to work with the TV, but it's not the air remote's fault. Having a remote to my PC is so awesome. I wish I bought it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works for Odroid control
customer_reviews.text: If you have or looking to buy an Odroid C2 with Android OS, then don't buy their remote, buy this one! It will control Kodi, Netflix, Amazon Video, etc. Wish the play/pause button were shaped like a play triangle or separated from the buttons at top. Works at our viewing distance of about 12' as a mouse with good response. Keyboard works great for searching movie/tv titles.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nicely replaces lost Android box remote
customer_reviews.text: Lost a "leelbox" remote somewhere in my granddaughter's room. This one is actually much nicer - the "air mouse" functionality is much better than the etch-a-sketch action on the old one. A long time ago I had a Gyration air mouse remote that was like $100. Gotta love how much cheaper this is now. One surprise is that the power button turns the box off, but doesn't turn it on. Makes sense when you think about it, but it was unexpected. So I just don't turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: wwinch

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 sets of alkaline batteries in a couple of hours. Batteries get hot during use indicating a high discharge rate. First set of batteries leaked electrolyte as result of overheating. Might be acceptable as a wireless keyboard if you keep the air mouse function off most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great quality remote and great Company that stands behind there product.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality remote and great Company that stands behind there product. I purchased this remote to work with a custom-built (HTPC) home theater PC that uses Raspberry pie 4 running LibreELEC. This remote is Fantastic for HTPC it is plug and play!!! no need to mess around with settings it just works and has a great feature set.
customer_reviews.author: Power9001

customer_reviews.title: A MUST FOR ANDROID BOXES
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this air mouse other than that it would be nice if the back had lighted keys. I find it a necessity for using an android box. All the controls work as any other remote. The difference is the cursor on the TV screen and the ease with which you can enter data with this air mouse. I have 3 Android boxes and all there have this mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Mason B. Yeaton

customer_reviews.title: Great remote.
customer_reviews.text: This remote works beautifully with Kodi. The keyboard is deactivated and unlit until you flip it over. Only issue I've had with it which isn't really an issue at all, the mouse pointer button randomly turns on and I have to turn it off which can cause a few seconds of confusion.
customer_reviews.author: JamieBaker

customer_reviews.title: Great remote for android box and projector
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this remote to use with my Kdlinks A400 which is an android box with Kodi. It worked with Kodi perfectly. I have all the same function buttons on this remote that I have on the stock remote. The air mouse and keyboard work great. i was able to easily program this remote to turn on the Kdlinks box as well as turn on and off my projector. Shipping was fast. For the the price and what it does, this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Williams

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this remote is the backlight and that the fast forward buttons work in Kodi. However, I use it on a dedicated HTPC with Kodi and it only reaches about 4ft. It works intermittently and the mouse is all over the place. I had a Minix before that got coke spilled on it that worked okay. But anything is better than fighting with this favormates remote.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny - What a pleasant surprise!!
customer_reviews.text: I debated purchasing a few other brands that were very similar to this product and I am glad that I paid the extra couple of bucks to get this backlit wonder. It is easy to use and the mouse function and keyboard is great. I love the fact that it is backlit and it is very easy to calibrate the mouse to the center of the screen. I haven't programmed my TV yet because I primarily use this for my Android TV box and it is a gem. I don't have to rely on the poor remote provided by the box manufacture. I own two of these gems!!
customer_reviews.author: RaidersFanAz

customer_reviews.title: Well made light up remote.
customer_reviews.text: I now have 2 of these, one for upstairs and one for downstairs. I've bought more darn remotes over the last year to use with my android tv boxes and they all were junk. This one is great. The light actually works. The remote has a soft feel in your hand when clicking and it is silent! It has a full keyboard on the back that stays lit and it has a mouse curser also.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: better than my big wireless keyboard
customer_reviews.text: once i tried it i dumped the TKL wireless keyboard so now i have small remote in my right hand to control my pc when i sit on the couch. i like: -the build quality. -full keyboard layout. -back-lit helps alot. only one thing that i wish it has touch right and left mouse clicks, it annoys me whenever i move the motion mouse on small icon to use left click "ok button" the pressure on the button lightly shakes the motion mouse which cause to click on another icon and open wrong program xD.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Boy, this is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my HTPC while I'm in bed, and it does just about everything I ask of it. Setup is as easy as plugging in the dongle. The backlight is good, the air mouse works fine, everything basically exceeds my expectations for the price. Only real gripe is that there is no indicated for the Alt function being on (which leads to me often typing gibberish) and there's no F-key functions, but hey, you can only ask for so much.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Williams

customer_reviews.title: About as good as it gets, as advertised, easy to use and plug and play on linux, mac, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Its one of those things showing what is possible, and you wished all design and engineering people would follow with the same, or high quality ideas. Well done, highly recommended, love it. Simple to use, install, and works on a TON of platforms. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dave Osbourne

customer_reviews.title: I have Benq mh740 projector. The remote came with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have Benq mh740 projector. The remote came with it broke. I bought to control my MacBook and the projector. The 5 programmable buttons (4 color buttons and the power button) are used for my projector for power on/off and input selections. The remote is more responsive than my original remote. Now, I can use the Favormates AIr Remote Mouse to replaced my Logitech wireless mouse, Keyboard, and my projector remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one
customer_reviews.text: There are a bunch of different ratings on this so maybe they are different in each lot or something. The battery life on mine is terrible. About 2 days even if you are not using it. I use it with a pi. It seems that every time I pick it up it needs new batteries. Finally I just started taking the batteries out when I am not using it. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Can't say anything good really.
customer_reviews.text: Can't really say anything good about it. Poor battery life, cheap feel, keyboard toggles are awkward and unlabeld. Button layout is not very intuitive. And the worst thing if all is it will only work on one side at a time that being the side that is facing up. This means if you have it held in any other way than face up the buttons won't work.
customer_reviews.author: TCGF F.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, with a bit of practice, but someone tell me one good reason for printing the instructions so small. Does it really reduce costs? They are practically useless. Update- after a few weeks of use, it suddenly stopped working. I thought I had mastered its use, but now it is completely erratic. Changed batteries, followed all suggestions. Nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Odum

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: After inserting the USB dongle into my Windows 10 PC, it was not recognized by the PC and showed up as not working in the device manager. Also, after inserting batteries into the remote, the LED did not light when I pushed any buttons. Must not have any quality control on these products at all. Seems sorting out of defective goods is to be done by the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Meeper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worthless
customer_reviews.text: This worthless remote stops working every five minutes, requiring you to get up and unplug and re plug the USB dongle. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much for around $15, but this is an amazing little piece of electronics. I plugged it in to a Linux Mint OS and it worked instantly! Have not played with the keyboard side, I didn't get it for that. I got is because I am lazy and now I can watch stuff on my computer without messing with a mouse! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hawke

customer_reviews.title: Should've purchased one of these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I own an NVIDIA Tablet K1 and this remote works perfect with it, connected to my non smart tv through mini hdmi (tablet) Now I don't have to get up to mess with it. Best of all is the low price of it. There's better ones out there I'm sure of it, but this little guy has made all the difference. Connects through USB wireless dongle, I have it setup through an OTG cable and instantly worked no hiccups. Gets a thumbs up from me
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works for kindle fire usb-  for now
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the amazon fire tv because you can use the keyboard to get back to the main screen. After frustratingly attemting to use netflix and watch things on the nfl app I started to use my xbox exclusively as my cable modem streaming speeds ( 100 mbps) no longer require me to download movies.
customer_reviews.author: VitaTTop Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Works out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my raspberry pi, but tried it on my windows laptop first. Was pleasantly surprised that it works without a hitch. the mouse function is cool and the mouse does indeed stop when you flip it over. the keypad is responsive and overall fine to type on. would buy again without question
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Witzel

customer_reviews.title: No complains - just make sure you’re ok with keyboard layout
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully as a remote for your PC. - Just don’t expect the keyboard to be easy to type your passwords with. Review the keyboard layout before you purchase. - Tip: hold at a fixed rotation and pitch to avoid it getting confused with what keys you’re pressing to type.
customer_reviews.author: Some Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Backlit is worth it... and this one costs = or less than competitors!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd similar remote for android TV box / LG TV, but decided to get the backlit version from Favormates instead of prior brand. This one is great! I have not yet programmed the 4 IR buttons yet, but expect that it will work fine. (Will update review if they don't.) Backlight works reasonably well, although it flickers sometimes when the remote moves front <> back but it functions enough to get the job done. Also on sale which made it a better deal than all others at under $14. Customer service seems to care about the product with contact emails.
customer_reviews.author: Eors-tail

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My original remote control stopped working months ago. I bought another remote that I was told was compatible but it didn't have air remote or keyboard and that what I really needed. I put in my 2 triple A batteries ( not included) and the rest is history. So so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Most of the keys were not useful with KODI application
customer_reviews.text: Could not easily get the device to 'learn' from other IR remotes. Only the direction keys, the go key, volume keys and power key were useful. None of the others. Found the keyboard difficult to use. Could not tell when Shift was enabled. I did find the cursor control useful but the sensitivity was way off and the documents did not show how to adjust it. A waste of money. Just bought a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Work With A TCL Roku Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this remote to use with my TCL Roku Smart TV but the only thing the remote would do is turn the tv on and off. None of the other buttons worked at all. Might work great for other tv's but not mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Random functionality - Replacement working great. See updated review.
customer_reviews.text: When it works right it is great. Backlight turns on randomly which is really annoying. Sometimes it takes 2-3 punches for remote to start functioning. I purchased a very similar remote years ago from a different seller that never did any of this. Update: Customer service was very responsive to my concerns stated above. Offered suggestions for factory reset, which did not work, and eventually sent me a replacement. Didn't even make me return defective item. REPLACEMENT IS WORKING PERFECTLY. Very happy with this remote. Upgrading review from 3 stars to 5.
customer_reviews.author: K A Verble

customer_reviews.title: Great Nvidia shield remote!
customer_reviews.text: This remote is impressive! I've been using it with my Nvidia shield with Android Oreo. It's responsive and I love that it's battery powered. The buttons are clearly stamped and the backlit option is also great at night time use. The air mouse option is also awesome to use...along with the arrow keys on both sides of the remote. So far so good, thank you for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest but not the worst either
customer_reviews.text: I like this remote but it has limited range. It loses connection from my sofa to the TV. I have to hold by arm out. Also, there's a delay when typing on the keyboard. The floating pointer is just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Powers

customer_reviews.title: not well designed
customer_reviews.text: works ok, but not really though out. the video controls (play, ff, etc) are not laid out intuitively and neither are other buttons such as the backlight. so the buttons you need most often are the same shape as every other and you have to remember where they are, especially in low ambient light. could have been designed MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dwin

customer_reviews.title: Seriously disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The remote is ok, but I have issues with the keyboard part when I am searching for something. I press a letter once and it shows up on the screen 50 times. Also when I am looking through items, Ill press a key once and the remote sends a signal to the TV as if I've pressed the button 20 times. It starts skipping ahead. This is the first time using this brand, and I haven't had any issues with any other remotes I've used. Seriously disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Smith

customer_reviews.title: One bizarre quirky fault.
customer_reviews.text: This is absurd, but it will NOT work AT ALL if we put the battery cover on it. Will only work with the cover left off. That's not not acceptable. I'm not going to keep it and use it without the cover on it, that is just ridiculous. Sending back this faulty item. Sadly, because all the reviews suggested it was a good choice, and it probably is, unless you have one with this bizarre quirky fault.
customer_reviews.author: Ancora

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use with my android box...it won't pair with it...I tried the remedy printed in the instructions that came with it...still nothing...I will be returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: bigaljay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't turn on Android box using installed dongle??? Hmmmmmm....
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me say that this is one of the best MX3 remotes I have owned. There was only one problem that I've had. Installing the dongle into the side of my Android TV box, it seems that it can only turn off the box. Once the box powers off, you can't turn it back on. I've reached out to Favormates, and it was confirmed that the remote can only turn off the power and not turn on. Seems like something you should mention on the description of the device. Right? Besides that one flaw, it's a good remote over others that I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Doran

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly battery saving.
customer_reviews.text: I have to switch batteries a minimum of every two weeks. One short drop on hard floor and it completely fell apart. Just save your money and don't buy it. I've had this remote for 6 months and it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Loud Buttons
customer_reviews.text: So this remote does what it is supposed to do. I plugged it in and it just worked. I have to give it 3 stars for 2 reasons. First, the buttons are super loud when clicked and second, it is only my second day having this and the batteries are already dead. Otherwise it's a decent remote.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the lack of fine adjustment with the air mouse
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this was nice but using it for my HTPC proved to be more hassle than it was worth. The air mouse isn't accurate enough for regular use on a PC. Normal operations proved difficult because the slightest hand shake would move you away from your intended click. I had to return it. It was frustrating to use
customer_reviews.author: Davedough

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to find with the colored buttons, it's easy to read, and it's really nice that it's backlit. We have a million remotes (haha, not really, but you know what I mean) and this is one of the nicest we've ever had. Feels pretty sturdy, so we're hoping it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Eilonthay

customer_reviews.title: For the price this remote is great. The backlight is worthless in the dark for ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this remote is great. The backlight is worthless in the dark for the "ALT" keys. Other than that I really have no complaints for this remote. The air mouse works well. The keyboard works well. That "ALT" key in the dark though...keeps this thing from 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ChiBurger

customer_reviews.title: not recommended
customer_reviews.text: bought this as an alternative to a mouse., half the time you can point the thing behind you to get it to work., i have to shake it until if finally gets in tune with the TV. i would not recommend this to anyone

customer_reviews.text: Says fire tv witch is a lie, DOES NOT WORK WITH FIRE STICK, heres some buttons that dont work on fire stick - Return, home volume, only power and menu work and nothing else, DONT BUY THIS GARBAGE THAT DOESNT WORK!

customer_reviews.title: At First its Awesome - BUT BURNS THRU BATTERIES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and they both do the same thing.. I put 2 brand new fresh from the package, AAA Duracel and I've tried Energizer batteries.. 1 week later! - DEAD! And I'm not using the remote constantly. just a few times daily, like any normal remote if not less. I would not buy again!.. Seriously - it will BURN THRU BATTERIES..
customer_reviews.author: Corey Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my Android TV Box
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive and you can assign buttons for other TV functions. The only complaint is when I restart my TV box the USB dongle has to be pulled out and plugged back in for the remote to work again
customer_reviews.author: Ted B

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work with windows 10
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use it with my device running windows 10 and it didnt work at all, it only shows a unknown device connected and thats it, there's is no way to update the drivers or anything to make it work. It might be good, but don't buy it for use on windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tafolla

customer_reviews.title: Great all in 1 remote
customer_reviews.text: This one remote replaces the standard remote on an android box and allows you to control and use all the features of the standard remote and much, much more. The air mouse control is very fluid and self correcting allowing for easy couch surfing, and a flip of the remote activates the back lit keyboard and disables the mouse and when you flip it back over vice versa. Best one out there especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chile5o

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a rpi3b+ kodi build. The remote is very responsive and I have had no trouble typing on it, unlike a different remote that I can't remember the name of.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kodi

customer_reviews.title: Air mouse is actually usable
customer_reviews.text: if there was a STOP button, I'd give it 5 stars. play, pause, and the various home/menu buttons are fine. where the heck is the stop? All that said, i'd certainly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Damp

customer_reviews.title: Batteries life is the worst. Don't wate your money.
customer_reviews.text: This has been my worst buy in Amazon as of today. The thing is that the batteries last about 3 days. Can't really tell about other features because this issue is the most important of all.
customer_reviews.author: Calebguada

customer_reviews.title: Nice device.
customer_reviews.text: Really nifty little remote. The front is a regular remote and the back is a keyboard. It also has a gyro mouse built in so just tip it around to move the cursor. Works great with a HTPC.
customer_reviews.author: Heidiv

customer_reviews.title: Great use just not that durable for falls.
customer_reviews.text: I love this remote. The only cons I have are that batteries placed in this remote don't last long. Also it isn't that durable it fell from my lap and came apart. The clips also broke. All in all the use of this remote is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ville

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I used this during a Prezi presentation at work and I got lots of compliments on how fluidly I was able to jump around to various parts of the presentation just by aiming the remote as I walked around the room, instead of fumbling with a traditional mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Remote!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value. Works with our home theater PC like a charm. Easy to learn buttons, and programmable with up to four commands from other remotes, which we used to control the volume on our sound bar for our home theater. If you are looking for an air mouse for a home theater PC or presentation PC, this is a great remote, at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Amazon firestick
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn’t work with fire stick. The product is very cheap. Returning it.

customer_reviews.title: It works great. i had used one of those mini keyboards ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Raspberry pi 3. It works great. i had used one of those mini keyboards before this and I like this a lot better. The buttons work great. One thing I learned if you hit the button to turn off the mouse, the arrow keys and the OK key work a lot better on the front side, otherwise I would have to point the remote to the menu before the arrow keys would scroll through the menus.
customer_reviews.author: kal

customer_reviews.title: Better than just a remote or a Kodi keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have not used a air mouse before, but when I got used to it, I loved it. I will definitely buy another 1 or 2. I have a Kodi keyboard with track pad, hate it. I don't like track pads. I love the lighting system.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent control! I didn't expect it to be so great!
customer_reviews.text: Con: Pointer is a bit hard to use. PRO: It also comes with a pointer feature. Yes! You can select items from your screen by pointing.. a cursor will move where you point. This is neat. Also, there is a back keyboard. It saves time! It worked perfectly with an Android TV Box! <3
customer_reviews.author: Editor Banned

customer_reviews.title: This works great with our home theater PC (Windows 10)
customer_reviews.text: This works great with our home theater PC (Windows 10). Easily read/copied IR code of our monitor power on/off. Had problems with previous remotes having volume up/down/mute default to controlling monitor/TV volume. This remote correctly controlled the PC volume controls the first time. Also, keyboard (esp. space bar = pause/play) comes in handy to control Youtube now that Streamkeys is no longer supported by Google.
customer_reviews.author: MK from Dunnellon, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: Strayed from the usual Rii wireless mouse / keyboards and the Favormates hits all the sweet spots. AAA batteries instead of usb charging is a huge plus. No on / off switch that breaks off after a few drops - awesomeness. Backlit keys are great; a small weak point is that the keyboard keys are difficult to see if no direct light source is on them (lounging on the couch with your head and body facing the sunny side. All in all a good product!
